title: Add SMSStream to support SMS messaging
description:
With the TopicStream (SOLR-8588) wrapping up it makes sense to implement an SMS Stream that wraps the TopicStream and pushes SMS messages. 

Research needs to be done to determine the right SMS library. More details to follow on syntax as the this ticket develops.

comments.author: David Smiley
comments.content:
-0
IMO SMS handling is a bit specialized to be in Solr core.

comments.author: Dennis Gove
comments.content: I'm happy to house this as a submodule in https://github.com/dennisgove/streaming-expressions.
